text: waebdu allah wanqadu lah whdh, wala tajealuu lah shrykana fi alrbwbyt walebadt, wa'ahsanuu 'iilaa alwaldyn, waddu hqwqhma, wahuquq alaqrbyn, walyatamaa walmhtajyn, waljar alqarib minkum walbeyd, walrfyq fi alsafar wafi alhdr, walmsafr almhtaj, walmmalyk min ftyankm wftyatkm.
